caseTitle: Regarding rejection of the motion of no-confidence against the Prime Minister v.
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Mazhar Alam Khan Miankhel
tagline: The Speaker/Deputy Speaker had shown sheer disregard for the mandatory provisions of the Constitution—The ruling of the Speaker dated 03.04.2022 and the subsequent acts of the PM and the President were a nullity in the eye of law---Parliament is to determine whether to proceed under Article 6 of the Constitution.
